cast.overview: During World War II, two French civilians and a downed British Bomber Crew set out from Paris to cross the demarcation line between Nazi-occupied Northern France and the South. From there they will be able to escape to England. First, they must avoid German troops – and the consequences of their own blunders.
cast.title: Don't Look Now... We're Being Shot At!
cast.character: German officer of the dining car

details.biography:
Helmuth Schneider (18 December 1920 – 17 March 1972) was a German actor.

Schneider portrayed the role of Uncle Dimitri in The White Horses.

He died in a traffic accident in Rio de Janeiro in 1972.

Source: Article "Helmuth Schneider" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Helmuth Schneider
